text: Hontōni ware wa, nūfu ya kare-igo no yogen-sha-tachi ni keiji shita yō ni, anata ni keiji shita. Ware wa mata iburāhīmu, isumāīru, isuhāku, yaakōbu oyobi sho shizoku ni (keiji shi), mata i ― sā, isuhāku, yūnusu, hārūn narabini suraimān ni mo (keiji shita). Mata ware wa dāūdo ni shihen o sazuketa
